overview.en: The Gcchain system is a blockchain system that uses blockchain technology to combine ad distribution with online shopping. The system uses GCC as a medium to obtain its own GCC by clicking on an ad and selling new or unused second-hand items on the Gcchain eco-shopping platform. Gcchain follows the concept of decentralization, allowing users to earn revenue in the Gcchain ecosystem and buy and sell the items they want on the platform.
overview.zh: Gcchain生态体系是一款利用区块链技术，将广告分发与网购平台相结合的区块链生态体系。该体系以GCC为媒介，利用点击广告等方式赚取属于自己的GCC，同时也可在Gcchain生态网购平台上销售全新的或闲置二手的物品赚取GCC。Gcchain遵循去中心化的构想，用户在Gcchain生态中可以利用闲余时间赚取丰厚外快，并可以在平台上买卖自己想要的物品。
